meta.short_description: A playful, extreme close-up 'nose-first' portrait of a dog. Using a fisheye lens to create a comical 'big nose' effect, the dog appears to be sniffing the camera lens against a clean, minimalist background.

positioning.body_visible: nose and snout dominant, head and body receding rapidly into the distance
positioning.alignment: nose centered and closest to lens
positioning.eye_contact: looking directly into the lens with wide, curious eyes

subject.focus: razor-sharp focus on the wet texture of the nose, soft bokeh on the ears and body

camera_gear.perspective: extreme forced perspective, exaggerated snout-to-head ratio

lighting.details: bright, even illumination to highlight nose texture and whiskers, vibrant catchlights in eyes

texture.quality: hyper-detailed wet nose leather, fine whiskers, glossy eyes

background.details: pure solid color, zero depth, no floor/wall transition, no paper seams, no equipment visible
